Title: Episode 6
Plot: With the Prime Minister away at a summit in Spain, Malcolm Tucker is left at home to mind the shop. Just as Nicola Murray is about to launch her Fourth Sector Initiative to the media, the media decide that what they really want is someone to launch another leadership contest. Does Nicola have what it takes and, if she does, can Malcolm take it away from her before she does any damage?
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Sexual references and offensive language
Writer: Sean Gray, Simon Blackwell, Armando Ianucci, Ian Mart
